Text: Referencespst Louise You treated me with a degree of candor and respect this morning that was really refreshing to me although I must admit that you caught me offguard If you give me the chance I will be a leader in your organization There is not the slightest doubt in my mind that I can generate the new ideas and the new business that you require of a top performing Vice President In fact I am dying to get a chance to prove to you that I can deliver results I dont want to loose any more time than I already have I want to start now As you dont know well some of the people whos names I gave you as references you might also want to try Scott Neal or Don Black Both of them know me quite well and would give you an opinion on my ability to deliver what you are looking for Thank you for the opportunity Steve
Re Need another referenceThanks a lot I really appreciate your support Steve

Need another referenceThanks for the help with Dave Duran He wants to offer me a job and he sent me to talk to Louise Kitchen today which I did She told me that she wanted to check my references I was wondering if you would be willing to drop her a note on me She would probably put a lot more stock in your view than in most of the other guys I have worked with in EI and EBS Thanks I appreciate it Steve

Upgrading gasHave you ever heard of anyone upgrading medium Btu gas like landfill gas for example in some way to get it up to pipeline specs Do you know any Chem E type who might have some idea of what it would take to do this Steve
